name: Locus (LongJohnny)
description:
An electrical breakdown occured in a space station, the network failed and now the space suits of two astronauts only work when they move at the same time. You will control both astronauts, simultaneously, and travel across the space station to reach the controls room and eventually reset the network.

This game provides a unique experience where having good independent control of each hand comes in handy. The game also contains a few challenging puzzles.
